about_the_game:
The following is a description in English:
The game is an adventure game about the world is attacked by the army of magic things, the protagonist is sent to the town below to find against the army of magic things, through the NPC to get clues to complete a task to find the Terran holy sword, so as to defeat the army of magic things, each task has a weak hint, do not worry about not doing the task.

You HAVE YOUR OWN HEALTH AND STRENGTH BAR, AS well AS MANA, HEALTH can be REPLENISHES with DRINK MEDICINE, attacks require STRENGTH, AND THE STRENGTH bar can be automatically regenerated.

The game play is parkour, stealth, combat and other gameplay.

The operation is also convenient:

w is to go forward, s is to go backward, a is to go left, d is to go right, ctrl is to squat, shift is to accelerate sprint, riding, dismounting, dialogue and other interactions can be used with e key, f is to hook and lock,

1 KEY IS TO PICK UP THE MELEE WEAPON, 2 KEY is to drink medicine, 3 key is TO pick up the long-range weapon, 4 key is to shout mount, the left MOUSE button is to attack, the right mouse button is to block

short_description: 该游戏是chenyifan工作室独立研发的一款以中世纪为题材的RPG冒险类游戏加入中世纪教堂和哥特式建筑风格。自由度高的战斗方式 玩家可以拿刀也可以拿弓也可以骑马让玩家感受到骑着马奔跑的无限乐趣玩法有跑酷潜行等比较流行的玩法操作比较常规的操作让玩家轻松的游玩该游戏体验无限的乐趣。
